title: Consistent 4 minute Lag Spikes every 30 mins??
body:
So for the past two years whenever I play League there would be about a 2 minute long lag spike every 20 minutes literally 24/7. I also found that this happens not only on league, but on any other games. After having the router and modem changed a few months ago, I was then able to play normally without lag. However, today I found that the regular lag spikes came back despite the new router/modem and now they were 4 minutes long and occurred approximately every 30 minutes, which has made it impossible/very annoying to play normally.  
Wondering if anyone had similar problems or knows why this is happening?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sounds like it might be a problem with your ISP and/or router/modem (Have you tried rebooting these [power off/on]).

I would recommend first running through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article, if nothing there helps could you please do the following:

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.
